fields.exhdesc_t: 75way offers a broad range of digital software services serving Enterprise, SME's, Startup Industries:  AI/ML Software Development   Web applications & software development.  Mobile application development.  Custom software applications and startup solution support.  Blockchain applications.   IOT App Development

ABEYE is a neuroscience deeptech focusing on the neurovisual system. Backed by award-winning science, our products instantaneously improve reading comfort for people with reading challenges (CES award 2020). ABEYE exhibits Lexilens screen, a PC monitor embedding the Lexilens technology.  Advancing inclusion in education and the workplace.

ACE is North America’s premier Climatic Testing Facility. Creating controlled and repeatable weather in a full-scale lab environment is what we do. We can create -40C to +60C as well as wind, rain, snow and fog in our Climatic Wind Tunnel. ACE has the facility and the expertise that companies need to develop & validate their products.

Leading the Paradigm of Learning and Meeting Solutions for AI Smart Classrooms and Offices    We are evolving into a global artificial intelligence convergence development company, delivering the best value to customers through AI smart education and meeting solutions.

ARIN is the nonprofit corporation that manages the distribution of Internet number resources – IPv4, IPv6, and Autonomous System Numbers (ASNs) – in many Caribbean and North Atlantic islands, Canada, and the United States. For more information about ARIN services, routing security, policy development and more visit www.arin.net.

AMFITRACK™ is an embedded stand-alone, high precision, low-cost electromagnetic tracking system. The AMFITRACK™ system positions an object in 3D, outputting the absolute position (XYZ) and orientation (pitch/yaw/roll) of the system components relative to each other, making it a true (6DOF) electromagnetic tracking system.

Founded in 2006 and headquartered in Nanjing, ArcherMind targets to be a global intelligent OS leader.  Mainly concentrates on technology research & development and solution services in the fields of automotive, intelligent terminals, AI, IoT and Mobile Internet.ArrayMo is specialized in R&D of intelligent vehicle OS-related products.

Archi’s Academy is an AI-powered experiential assessment platform that helps companies evaluate developers through real-world, GitHub-integrated projects, rather than traditional coding tests. We bridge the gap between learning and hiring by partnering with accelerators, universities, and HR platforms to identify job-ready talent.

We deliver a native AI platform and modular companion robot to support children with autism. Our solution offers affordable, personalized, and engaging learning across homes, schools, and clinics, bridging the autism care gap with adaptive, emotion-aware technology. Built by the autism community, backed by AI experts, and ready to scale.

Beespenser develops advanced micro-dispensing systems that enable rapid prototyping of functional circuits on flexible or rigid surfaces. Our flagship product, Monobee, combines precision printing, drilling, and curing in one platform, transforming how electronics are designed, validate, and evolved.

BENFEI designs and manufactures AV Adapters, Cables, Hubs, Data Storage and Charging product. With 20+ million user base, including corporations, AV integrators, education institutions, and IT professionals. Join our Global Distribution network and Explore Partnership Opportunities.

We aim to create humanoid robot products, uniting developers globally to drive productivity evolution. We offer developer-friendly humanoid robots and efficient development tools to boost the implementation of embodied AI.

Bevo Company, with 20+ years in NYC, has grown from a leading construction services provider into a smart-building innovator. Since 2003, we’ve specialized in plumbing, sprinklers, electrical, fire alarms, HVAC, and solar panels—now delivering BMS and IoT solutions for residential, commercial, educational, and hospitality spaces.

Combines interactive training hardware with AI powered software to deliver professional grade performance tracking across sports, health, education, and entertainment sectors. Deployed in 40+ countries, we provide real time analytics, digital coaching, and talent identification. Actively seeking distributor partnerships globally.

Chitech Shenzhen Technology Co., Ltdfounded in the year 2009 and ISO-certified,whichis focusing on smart electronic devices' designing,R&D,manufacturing and marketing.Main products included tablet pc,laptops,digital photo frames and All-in-One,also includes other IOT products.

CHOISTECHNOLOGY CO., LTD. develops IoMT-based medical devices, including ThermoSafer, a non-invasive wireless core body temperature monitor for hospitals and home care. We enhance patient safety with continuous, accurate monitoring and smart healthcare innovation.

CMAI is the only integrated professional registered Association in India for Mobiles, Telecom, ICT, Education, Cyber Security, Communications, Multimedia, Manufacturing Industries and Infrastructure Sector having more than 48,500 members. It is an apex premier body with more than 54 International and National MOU partners.

CREATANT is an intelligent visual workspace that acts as your Creative Intelligence, unifying your inspiration, creation, and clients. It auto-tags and organizes every digital asset and learns your project aesthetic and workflow, accelerating your creative process to bring ideas to life faster.    Video:  https://youtu.be/KDT42FTnEnU

DVJ builds tools to empower neurodivergent individuals navigate the world with confidence.    In 2025 we created SpectrumScan, a mobile and smartwatch app that uses built-in sensors to track light, sound, and stress signals in real time, alerting users before reaching sensory overload.

DEEP Robotics is a leader in embodied AI technology innovation and application, being the first in China to achieve fully autonomous inspection of substations with quadruped robots.     DEEP Robotics' self-developed robot series have been successfully deployed in various applications, including power station, factory, and tunnel inspections

Satoshi Holdings delivers quantum-secure drone platforms with autonomous flight and mission control for defense, industry, and public safety. Expanding globally with innovative, reliable, and secure technology, we also run consumer brands including CarePlus health supplements, KHUF functional underwear, and beauty education services.

Technosource HK Ltd offers high quality IT products for distribution with its own brands Advance (PC products) and Teros (gaming products). We are one of the few operations certified ISO 9001:2015 by the British Standards Institution, and we also offer OEM services in Spanish for Latin America.

Dongguan HuaWang Leather  Technology Co., Ltd. was established in 2009,specializing in the production and development of various  middle and high grade PU leather, microfiber , water-based PU (water-based protein PU),solvent-free PU, silicone leather, bio-based PU leather,recycled PU leather and other new ECO-friendly packaging materials.

fields.exhdesc_t: Dot has been working continuously striving to develop affordable technology for visually impaired individuals.  We are developing technologies that make information easily accessible to everyone, regardless of disability, empowering individuals with visual and audiovisual impairments to connect with the world more seamlessly.

Lili for life intelligent lighting provides children and adults with dyslexia with unrivalled comfort when it comes to reading. The brightness emanating from the light can be individually adjusted, naturally reorganising the letters. At home, at school, at the office… Lili lamp and screen accompanie its users wherever they need it!

EKLEER, a CES Innovation Award winner, develops smart displays that transform Android phones into full desktop workstations. Designed for emerging markets and mobile-first users, EKLEER enables affordable digital access to education, work, and healthcare.

Elephant Robotics is a high-tech company specializing in the design and production of robotics, in terms of development, applications of operating systems and intelligent manufacturing services. With our mission, "Enjoy Robots World," we're dedicated to making the convenience and benefits of robotics accessible to everyone in daily life.

EmdoorVR, established in 2015 in Shenzhen, is a subsidiary of Emdoor INFO (001314.SZ), a Shenzhen main board listed company of Emdoor Group. With artificial intelligence (AI) wearables, virtual reality (VR) and augmented reality (AR) business capabilities, the company has a wealth of customers and channel resources around the world.

Epilog Laser is the leading designer and manufacturer of CO2 and fiber laser engraving, cutting, and marking systems. Used extensively in a variety of industries, Epilog systems and mark and cut wood, acrylic, textiles, glass, and much more.

Epseed revolutionizes remote work security with Seed, a smart USB device that creates isolated workspaces on any computer. It combines enterprise-grade security with powerful HR management tools, helping companies protect sensitive data while monitoring employee wellbeing and productivity in remote environments.

The main technique of the EVA MILL is a wireless audio and video transmission system. With professional technology and experience, we assist customers in improving business efficiency, popularizing mobile learning education, and optimizing home life experiences

EZCast is a leading brand in wireless display technology, enabling seamless peer-to-peer screen sharing for meetings, education, and film production. With strong connectivity, smart design, and stable performance, EZCast empowers people worldwide to collaborate and create effortlessly.

The Federal Laboratory Consortium (FLC) is a network of 300+ federal labs dedicated to accelerating technologies into the marketplace.     Visit our shared booth space with NASA, US Army DEVCOM, VA and Air Force Technology Transfer and Transition.

Flowtica AI, founded in 2024, integrates AI seamlessly into creative work and daily life. Our first product, Flowtica Scribe, an AI voice recorder, launched in late 2025. We don’t chase gimmicks; we make thinking and creativity more natural and efficient. Our team brings 0-to-1 experience from DJI, Google, and Microsoft Research Asia.

Flyball Electronic (Shenzhen) Co., Ltd is a company founded in 2004, we have around 600 employees, We do OEM and ODM for brands worldwide over 70 countries, with operations in India, America, South America, Europe, the Middle East, and Asia Pacific regions. brands such as Philips, Motorola, Altec Lansing, Panasoinc, Trust, Creative etc.

FunTech Innovation (FTI) designs innovative and AI-powered collaboration solutions that revolutionize remote communication and create the most true-to-life experience in a virtual environment. Powered by big data and consumer insight discovery, we infuse fun, artistic design and surprising technologies into our products.

FunIT Inc. develops XR, VR, AR, and AI-based systems that enhance spatial recognition, real-time interaction, and digital simulation. Our advanced solutions provide immersive, data-driven training experiences across defense, industrial, and educational fields, driving innovation in next-generation virtual environments.

FusionLex builds an adaptive cognitive OS (iDiscover) that turns language, emotion, and context into real-time business actions across APIs and enterprise platforms, enabling systems to understand, predict, and act naturally through voice and connected interfaces.

Team FutureDuck is a group of IT and education experts who produce Edtech products and educational content to cultivate original thinkers who don't rely on AI. With our question generating AI technology, we have launched Quewrite, an education platform that provides personalized writing guidance.

Georgia’s Innovation and Technology Agency (GITA) is a state entity promoting innovation and startup ecosystem in the country, operating under the supervision of the Ministry of Economy and Sustainable Development of Georgia.

For over a decade, Future Tech has been a global leader in AI 3D display. We pioneered AI 3D display and capture on smartphones/tablets, backed by 100+ patents and major industry awards. This core technology drives our pioneering platforms—from 3D live streaming and shopping to navigation and education.

Seedpace is a brand that provides innovative AI-powered smart toys for children aged 3-8 worldwide.While reading to his 3-year-old, Seedpace founder heard, “If I were the hero, could I be brave too?” That question sparked Seedpace — an AI storytelling device helping kids become heroes of their own adventures.

fields.exhdesc_t: H2CTLAB Inc. explores undiscovered possibilities by reading future digital content trends. By integrating AI into online and offline spaces, we lead the digital transformation of content, delivering fantastic immersion.

HAICT delivers AI & STEAM learning solutions for K-12. Already in classroom use, our EZMaker kits and our EZON web platform power curriculum-aligned, project-based learning from science experiments to AI & deep-learning education. Students code, collect data, and solve real-world problems, building creativity & digital literacy.

Founded in 2021, Hangzhou Moretion Technology Co., Ltd. is the world’s first tech innovator mastering inertial, optical, and magnetic motion capture technologies.Our products and technologies are widely applied in virtual reality, education and training, robotics, and digital entertainment, serving well-known universities and enterprises.

Hanwang Technology Co., Ltd. was established in 1998 and possesses multiple core technologies with independent intellectual property rights in the fields of handwriting recognition, optical character recognition (OCR), facial recognition, handwriting input, and so on.

Haylo is an AI-powered wearable headband designed to support focus and retention for neurotypical and neurodivergent learners who struggle with traditional screen-based tools. Students interact with voice-first AI with captured video as the context

Leveraging advanced control technology and motion modules, Hengbot is committed to excelling in the field of intelligent hardware applications. As innovators in the robot actuator industry, we aim to accelerate the process of robot universalization and intelligence, creating a new breed of robots that are more flexible and intelligent.

HoloVu is AI-powered smart glasses and a cloud platform that recognizes what you see and overlays real-time insights. Users collaborate via in-view annotations for sports, education, shopping, healthcare, work, media, gaming, and security.
Huma transform screen time into a passion for learning by reshaping education for children aged 4-12 through AI mentors, educational games and a vibrant character-driven universe.

I-CAR is advancing collision repair education with a VR initiative, exploring hands-on experiences to prep technicians for vehicle technologies like EVs and automated safety features. As the industry’s leading technical resource, I-CAR promotes safe, quality repairs through innovative training programs that protect drivers and passengers.

iBoda is an online platform offering personalized art education using students' art learning data. Its key products include an art aptitude test to analyze learning tendencies and an artwork critique by AI and experts. It combines online-offline learning and uses data to create a cyclical system, refining education to suit each student.

IEEE is the world’s largest technical professional organization dedicated to advancing technology for the benefit of humanity. With our members, we inspire a global community through highly-cited publications, technology standards, conferences, and educational activities. IEEE and our 400,000 members are the force behind innovation.

IMAGO Technologies is a global leader in smart collaboration solutions, empowering businesses and educational institutions to operate with more intelligent, future-ready technology. We deliver a complete, unified ecosystem for next-generation collaboration, integrating hardware, software, and cloud solutions into one seamless experience.

Innové Beauty+Wellness pioneers engineered spray mist booth technology that delivers full-body skin care in minutes.  With brands WELLFIT®, Mystic®, Norvell®, and VersaSpa®, we fuse beauty, science, and technology to create high-performance, tech-driven skincare experiences designed for all skin types and tones.

Instafarm brings the farm to your table with effortless, soil-grown microgreens. Our automated consumer and commercial models use intelligent sensors to deliver fresh, nutrient-dense food daily—helping families, food lovers, and businesses fuel health, beauty, and long-term wellness.

We develop interactive humanoid robots for a wide range of applications, from retail, healthcare, to education, where seamless, safe, and engaging human-robot experiences are critical. Our solution features fluid motion control algorithms and multimodal interaction services to enhance user engagement and task efficiency.

INTERACT implements high-quality 3D graphics in educational and training environments that are difficult to build realistically based on XR/VR and multi-access network technologies, develop and supply training systems in various fields like firefighting, military, police, civil security and etc.

Providing innovative tools for engineers in autonomy, testing, and embedded engineering for 30 years! Our comprehensive technology portfolio includes SOME/IP, AUTOSAR, Automotive Ethernet, CAN/FD, LIN, UDS, A2B, wBMS, J1939, and more.    We can support you no matter where you are.     Intrepid Control Systems - Driven By Your Data

iPresence delivers “Teleportation as a Service,” enabling people to connect and collaborate beyond physical limits with telepresence robots, digital twins, and the metaverse. We develop original robots, AI agents, and a teleportation platform while reselling global solutions, creating a platform for diverse work and information sharing.

iRomaScents® is a fragrance solutions innovator redefining scent discovery with AI personalization and advanced delivery systems. Its proprietary platform delivers instant recommendations and automated sampling, capturing real-time consumer insights, elevates engagement and enables brands to optimize strategy with powerful analytics.

Kaito Electronics has been reinventing emergency radios since 1997. We are ambassadors to NOAA’s Weather Ready Nation and are committed to producing top quality radios that will last a lifetime. Our hand crank and solar powered radios with NOAA weather band, AM/FM/Shortwave are perfect for any emergencies and outdoor adventures.

KONST is an AI infrastructure company specializing in AIDC design, high-performance GPU deployment, and hybrid AI cloud services. With expertise in liquid-cooling integration and its Glows.ai platform, We provides scalable, reliable compute solutions across Asia, Japan, and global markets.

Our patented Agreement Rate Game is a live talk show format that millions enjoy. It's a new quiz genre that trains metacognition and social awareness. We supply mass-scale SDK to platforms (OTT, SNS) for 1M concurrent user lock-in. We offer a vital solution for education and public sectors, mitigating confirmation bias and polarization.

Leesol leads innovation in Personal Digital Therapeutics. We use AI-Driven Precision Electrical Brain Stimulation to prevent and treat neurological disorders like sleep, depression, and dementia. Visit our booth to experience this optimized AI health solution and witness the technology shaping the future of healthcare.

Leia Inc. combines advanced optics and intelligent software to deliver Immersity on any device—today. LeiaSR transforms displays into 2D|3D switchable screens; Immersity AI converts 2D content into 3D. Together, they bridge the gap between today's displays and the future of fully immersive 3D experiences, advancing digital interaction.

Lexibook America Inc. specializes in educational and leisure electronics. It designs and markets a wide range of products, particularly educational toys for children. Lexibook America Inc. especially stands out for its use of many popular licenses such as Disney and Paw Patrol. Innovation is central to its strategy, with constant renewal.

Located in the port city of Ningbo, LUMI provides mounting solution products for the office, home, and pro-audio-visual market. LUMI has over 20 years of OEM/ODM project experience to bring products to life. Our product development team continues to innovate coupled with quality components and advanced materials.

MagitiQ is a 0.5″ cube that clips onto any pair of glasses to turn them into AI eyewear. It invokes real-time insights exactly where you’re looking—on your computer, smart TV, or mobile screen. It works whether you’re watching live sports, streaming movies, or browsing the web.

Carvera-the world's most intelligent desktop CNC. With auto tool changing, PCB milling, 4th axis & closed-loop system, it delivers versatility, precision & accuracy, empowering students to craft intricate designs easily. With clean, quiet operation, Carvera is the ultimate choice for classrooms and labs. Shape your idea with Carvera.

Founded in 2020, our company focuses on the research, development, and production of innovative robotic solutions designed to enhance quality of life.  We showcase our robotic products in collaboration with esteemed partners such as Ubuntu, ROS, OpenCV, AWS, and IEEE.

MetaVu develops industrial XR solutions such as remote collaboration, realistic training, and real-time work guide solutions through VR, AR, MR, and digital twin technologies.  These solutions can help you improve work efficiency, secure work environments, increase productivity, and save time and money.

Miko is a US-based consumer electronics company creating AI-powered robots, focused on STEAM learning, SEL, and cognitive growth. Miko Mini, Miko Sparky (coming soon), and Miko 3 offer interactive learning with stories, music, and dance. While Miko Chess and Chess Grand are automated chess with self-moving chess pieces.

Miniskop / Curiousbox is an edtech startup creating interactive STEM learning experiences for children. By integrating Iotifyedu’s IoT-based education platform, it combines physical exploration with digital innovation to make learning engaging, measurable, and fun.

MintMind is an AI-driven education platform for kids, families, and schools. It features adaptive tools like Kiddo Chatbot for emotional support and aids in reading, writing, math, and wellbeing. With real-time analytics and gamified content, it personalizes learning while ensuring privacy and engagement.

MOPIC specializes in Glasses-free 3D display solutions.  We provide 3D displays and SDKs that enable users to experience immersive 3D content without wearing glasses. Our technology is applied in fields such as medical, mobile, education, automotive, gaming, and exhibitions, offering easy integration and customization for partners.

MOSS is developing a "Producer AI", an intelligent audio assistant that automatically analyzes, mixes, and masters music with professional precision. By bridging human creativity and AI-driven production, MOSS empowers creators of all levels to produce studio-quality sound effortlessly and intuitively.

We are an innovative solutions provider for green energy and smart AI applications. We support our clients from concept to market launch, focusing on sustainable mobility, AI-driven software, and modern energy systems. Together, we accelerate CO₂ reduction and contribute to the SDGs.

Experience the future of hair transformation with the ReFa AI Color Recipe for professional and enterprise use. This seamless blend of AI and machine learning ensures precise, customized hair color guidance for stunning, confidence-boosting results every time. Perfect for seasoned professionals and apprentices getting their start.
FirstResume is an AI career agent targeted to help GenZs land their first job by automating the job hunt process from search to apply, giving them a competitive edge while saving time and effort.

myFirst is the world's first KidsTech Social Ecosystem with more than 1 million happy kids! Real tech for kids with fun KidsTech devices, connected services and our kids' suitable social circle network, myFirst Circle, to socialise, share and go anywhere, all safely connected with their friends and family. Currently in 54 countries.

We empower collaboration, streamline partnerships, and advance innovation to improve veterans’ health through ethical, efficient, and impactful research.

NewHaptics is transforming digital access for people who are blind with Codex, a first-of-its-kind multiline braille display. Debuting at CES 2026, Codex is the culmination of years of government-backed R&D and the hard work of a passionate team dedicated to making digital information truly accessible through touch.

NL.Durobo B.V. was founded in the Netherlands, where e-ink technology began to develop and make its way into the market. Inspired by this rich legacy of innovation, we are dedicated to making smart and intuitive ePaper devices that seamlessly integrate into everyday life.
Beautiful, smart products for kids that deliver the perks of smartphones - minus the risks.

NOETIX Robotics is a technology company specializing in the research, development, and manufacturing of humanoid and bionic robots.  All products come equipped with multiple control interfaces, ready to use out of the box, and support secondary development for various application scenarios.

Olive's Emotion AI platform uses machine learning to extract biometric information and identify emotional states in real time. Our cloud-based system is application-agnostic, fully passive and non-contact, and delivers accurate and actionable emotion insights through any device camera.

ONANOFF creates award-winning audio products that meet a wide range of listening needs. We are best known for initiating and extending the kids audio category by creating BuddyPhones, the world’s leading kids’ headphone brand.

P3 Labs AI creates interactive, emotionally intelligent digital human avatars that bring storytelling, education, and brand experiences to life. Using advanced AI, real-time 3D animation, and holographic displays, we humanize technology for retail, enterprise, museums, healthcare, sports, entertainment and personal legacy.

Parc is a productivity technology company creating simpler ways to manage work. Our first product, 2-b.ai, is an AI-powered to-do list that lets users drag any content to capture tasks and instantly turns them into clear, actionable steps. It also connects those steps to your favorite tools using AI agents and MCP-based integrations.

PathAble AI creates AI-driven tools that empower—not replace—support staff who assist people with disabilities to train for, find, and keep meaningful work. We cut paperwork, boost capacity, and improve employment outcomes for job seekers and the organizations that support them.

Persona AI is the rising AI startup in Korea.   Under the mission of 'Deeper Technology, Easier Service', we go for doing benefit everyone's daily life through AI.  We self-developed AI engines and showcase a product as an on-device AI. With original technologies such as natural language, voice, and vision, it is utilized in various domain.

Pongbot is an innovative high-tech company with expertise in AI algorithms, robotics, and human-machine interaction,with next-generation smart tennis & pingpong mahcine redefining training, education, and interactive entertainment.

POSTECH opened its doors in 1986 as the first research-oriented university in Korea to educate the brightest minds in the country and lead the transition of Korea’s higher education from dissemination to creation of knowledge.

RaDoTech - multifunctional essential health tracker. Reliable, mobile, FDA registered. Get report on 12 vital organs with easy 2 minutes test. Optimize your dieting, sports, supplements, sleep, daily activities with real feedback from your body. Enhance productivity and effectiveness. RaDoTech your ultimate functional health assistant

Realbotix can replicate a historical figure, a celebrity or bring to life a client's vision for a humanoid robot. Our clients choose what robot they want and customize the details and aesthetics of the robot's appearance and personality. We achieve this through patented technologies that deliver human-like appearance and movements.

RealMan is a leading high-tech enterprise specializing in the R&D, production, and sales of ultra-lightweight humanoid robotic arms, compound robot and actuators. ealMan’s products are widely applied in industries such as new retail, smart dining, commercial services, healthcare, quality inspection, education and research, manufacturing.

The birth of RED SOUND began with a group of young and energetic technical teams, and we have been committed to the deep insight and persistent exploration of the nature of sound in the audio field. With the firm belief in breaking the shackles of this technology, the team resolutely embarked on a long and arduous research and development

Part communication decoder ring, part sensory learning coach: Reed AI is like Duolingo for learning from daily life. Created to bridge language & literacy therapy gains with everyday life for millions of families – you just talk and it's transformed into therapist-trusted sensory learning for kids to see, hear, and feel what you meant.

We empower engineers to realize their visions in humanoids and the emerging field of Physical AI

Creating smarter accessories for Apple and Microsoft users, including the award-winning rugged Dux case for iPad & Surface, the innovative Dux Backpack, and the conveniently compact 3-1 ChargeTree charging stand. Founded in Australia 25 years ago, now a global leader selling in retail like Apple Store worldwide. STM is Smarter than Most.

By blending technology with expert curriculum, Think Academy is committed to creating engaging, accessible learning opportunities that shape the future of education.

Tech Up for Women, www.techupforwomen.com, educating and upskilling. Everyone needs to know about technology to advance their careers. To that end, we offer upskilling resources, workshops, conferences, Tech Up Talks and a platform with education, recruiting and content on a wide range of technology, innovation and career development.

With 85 years of proud tradition and ranking among the world's top 100 institutions, The Hong Kong Polytechnic University (PolyU) aspires to be a leading university with world-class research and education. fields.exhdesc_t: Established in 2016, Timekettle is an industry-leading translation solutions provider recognized by winning numerous international awards such as CES Innovation Award, iF Design Award, and TechCrunch. As the top-selling brand in the Translator Device industry, Timekettle now serves about 300,000 users worldwide.

tonies® is the world’s largest interactive audio platform for children with more than 9 million Tonieboxes and 100 million Tonies sold. The intuitive and award-winning audio system boosts independence and confidence in children through listening, play and exploration via extensive content for ages 1-9+ -- all without screens or ads.

Originating from Samsung Electronics’ C-Lab and spun off in 2019, it provides platforms that let creators worldwide easily create, edit, and share webtoons. With generative AI, Toonsquare turns ideas into visual stories.

Our company specializes in the EdTech sector, leveraging world-class generative AI and natural language processing technologies. Valens is a leader in high-performance connectivity, offering the highest bandwidth, the longest reach, and the lowest error rate. fields.exhdesc_t: Rooted in a passion for innovation, xTool was founded to make creation simple. Whether you're a home crafter or a small business owner, our tools support creativity in every form.

TESS GIFT AI Voice Mouse has received comprehensive overseas certifications. It combines AI voice and tools, offering free access to AI chat, AI PPT, and AI drawing features. ZWO is a leading innovator in astrophotography gears, specializing in the development and production of high-performance astrophotography cameras, smart telescopes, optical accessories, and software solutions.
